title: 66: The Funeral Oration of Pericles
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Thucydides wrote down, best he could, the funeral oration of Pericles, one of the greatest rulers(ish) of Athens. You'll hear the whole thing, then we discuss.
itunes:author: Bees, Wheez, and Cheese
itunes:subtitle: One of the greatest speeches of all times
itunes:summary: Thucydides wrote down, best he could, the funeral oration of Pericles, one of the greatest rulers(ish) of Athens. You'll hear the whole thing, then we discuss.
itunes:title: 66: The Funeral Oration of Pericles
